name: CoolKoala
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cool koala
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Helping kids ages 5-10 with ADHD and anxiety fall asleep fast.

Listening to these relaxing and soothing meditations will help your children gradually wind down for the night and gently transition into sleep.
And not only that, they will learn important life skills along the way.

Your kids will learn lifelong skills of self-regulation, emotional intelligence, and of course, good sleep to keep them healthy and happy.

We dedicate each day of the week to a special theme with a new meditation every night:

- Using deep breathing to reduce anxiety
- Developing compassion
- Reducing worries and stress
- Dealing with anger and frustration
- Relaxing your body
- Developing gratitude
- Increasing self-esteem

So, change into pjs, brush your teeth and get cozy. It's time to start Cool Koala, because bedtime doesn't have to be a struggle!

Important: This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis.
